DKA.Title: خريدة العجائب وفريدة الفرائب; Harīdat al-'aǧā'ib wa-farīdat al-ġarā'ib

div.h4:
خريدة العجائب وفريدة الفرائب
Harīdat al-'aǧā'ib wa-farīdat al-ġarā'ib
div.p:
Beskrivelse
Bought in Cairo 1761/62 by the Danish philologist Frederik Christian von Haven (d. 1763), a member of the Carsten Niebuhr expedition 1761-1767. Geography and natural history Nash̬ī script Described in detail in: Catalogue of Oriental Manuscripts in Danish Collections, vol. 5,3 [pp. 345-349]
